alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 10:46AM MST until December 31 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times above 6000 feet MSL. Light to moderate, mixed precipitation below 6000 feet MSL. Total snow accumulations above 6000 feet 10 to 20 inches with 6 to 10 inches below 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph may produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Bear River Range. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
